He needs a BP monitor so that he can check on himself as he tries to improve his health, to achieve his goal of being self-reliant again. Thank you for your support!

name: ART Kit for low-income family with child with severe ASD

It appears that youth may be staying in the hospital for an extended period of time. With the regulations enabling visitors to the hospital, the parents are required to take ART per visit. This is a low-income family with several other family members with other medical conditions that affect their capacity to work. We seek kind donors who are able to support this family with a large box of 25 ART Kits, to enable parents the opportunity to visit their son in the hospital. Interested donors, please contact Shiyan at 8554-8219 or shiyan@frcsfsc.sg. Thank you! Suggested ART Kit: https://www.watsons.com.sg/standard-q-covid-19-ag-home-test-antigen-rapid-self-test-(art)-kit-25s/p/BP_20186

Donors can get in touch with me on delivering the test kits to our office at (20 Lengkok Bahru, Playground Block, #03-02, Singapore 159053). Thank you!

name: Kitchen Cabinet

Her husband is currently employed as a food delivery rider on a part time basis, working only for a few hours each night as he helps client out in the day.
